blocks.text: Quiet midweek as Premier League leaders stay in control

blocks.label: Premier League Midweek
items: ⚽ Manchester City 3-0 Fulham — Dominant home win keeps City in title hunt
⚽ Aston Villa 1-0 Brighton — Narrow victory lifts Villa to third
⚽ Crystal Palace 2-3 Burnley — Five-goal thriller at Selhurst Park
⚽ Sunderland 0-1 Liverpool — Reds grind out away win

blocks.text: ⚽ Real Sociedad 1-0 Athletic Club — Copa del Rey progression secured
A low-key Wednesday with steady results. City's three-goal margin narrows the gap on Arsenal to four points, while Villa's win over Brighton keeps them in the top-three chase.
